siteMetadata.title: Plan to take over the world!

node.excerpt: The Diminuator will be my crowning success! With it I will be able to shrink the entire human race out of sight! BWAHAHAHAHA!!
Our new advertising campaign is in full swing and production of Diminuator units will be provided by Corley Manufacturing.
Install malware to slow all computers in the world to a standstill with the help of our good friend, Linux Tentacle:
